sections.heading: Solidarity is not indivisibilityA stipulation of solidarity does not make an obligation indivisible.Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1985.
sections.text: Solidarity is not indivisibilityA stipulation of solidarity does not make an obligation indivisible.Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1985.
